scripts.quickBuild: env-cmd -f ./src/utils/.env.dev react-scripts build && firebase deploy --only hosting --project=dev
scripts.build:dev: npm run test:dev && env-cmd -f ./src/utils/.env.dev react-scripts build && firebase deploy --only hosting --project=dev
scripts.build:prod: node generate-buildno.js && env-cmd -f ./src/utils/.env.prod react-scripts build && firebase deploy --only hosting --project=prod
scripts.deploy-functions:dev: firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only functions --project=dev
scripts.deploy-functions:prod: firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only functions --project=prod
